requirements.summary: Reduce vertical spacing between 'Born from Heartfelt Ideas' heading and adjacent paragraph
acceptanceCriteria: The paragraph immediately following the 'Born from Heartfelt Ideas' heading sits visibly closer to the heading with minimal vertical gap.
No other section spacing is unintentionally affected.

file_operations.description: In the AboutSection component, reduce the vertical gap between the 'Born from Heartfelt Ideas' h2 heading and its adjacent paragraph. Locate the container wrapping these elements (currently using gap-6) and reduce the gap to gap-1 or mt-1 on the paragraph element to create tighter vertical alignment.

requirements.summary: Decrease 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' brand subtitle font size by 2 Tailwind steps
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' text is rendered 2 font-size steps smaller than its current size.
The change is applied wherever this text appears (HeroSection, Navbar, or Footer).

file_operations.description: Decrease the font size of the 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' tagline text by 2 Tailwind font-size steps. If currently text-lg, change to text-sm; if text-xl, change to text-base. Apply this change to the tagline element within the HeroSection component.
If the 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' tagline appears in the Navbar component, decrease its font size by 2 Tailwind font-size steps to match the HeroSection update.
If the 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' tagline appears in the Footer component, decrease its font size by 2 Tailwind font-size steps to match the HeroSection update.

requirements.summary: Add WhatsApp phone numbers to ContactSection and Footer with clickable wa.me links
acceptanceCriteria: Both WhatsApp numbers are visible in the ContactSection with a clear WhatsApp label or icon.
Each number is a clickable link that opens WhatsApp (wa.me URL).
Both numbers also appear in the Footer contact details.
Numbers are displayed in a readable, formatted style consistent with the existing contact details.

Add both WhatsApp numbers (+91 9082777287 and +91 9920965759) to the Footer contact details block.
